body.transcript:
Hello, and thank you for calling NoteWorthy Music School. My name is Roy Wood. May I know whom I'm speaking with today?

Hi, Roy. This is Emily Ramirez.

It's great to speak with you, Emily! How can I assist you with your billing today?

I just wanted to check on the details of my last payment. I believe there may have been a small error.

Certainly, Emily! To verify your account, could you please provide me with your billing ID?

Sure, it's B one zero two three.

Thank you. And could you also confirm the amount from your last payment?

The last payment was for three five zero dollars.

I appreciate that, Emily. Let me take a quick look at your account. Alright, it seems like everything matches up correctly on our end. The three five zero dollars payment is recorded. Perhaps there was a delay in the update on your end?

Oh, okay. Thanks for confirming, Roy. I'll check again on my side.

You're welcome, Emily. If you need further assistance or if something still seems off, just give us a call. Thank you for reaching out to NoteWorthy, and I hope you have a wonderful day!

analysis.body: In this conversation, Roy Wood from NoteWorthy discusses billing with Emily Ramirez. The agent provides assistance and information about Music School.
